questions.text: Welcome to the Amazing Land of Adventures! You’re here because you’re excited to play games, learn something new, and meet other adventure-seekers. Everybody is welcomed! No need to be shy!
The gates will be opened to let you experience a brand-new adventure. Are you ready?
Ooops! Not too fast fellow adventure-seeker! Before we open the gate, it'll be nice to know your name and where are you from. (example: Cris of Barangay San Vicente)

Hello there (name)! It's great to have you here at the Amazing Land of Adventures. Remember: you need to earn five values badges so you will officially earn your adventure-seeker trophy. Carry on each stage with an honest heart and a strong mind!
Ready? But oh... what do we have here...another gate? Oops looks like there are a couple more questions you need to answer to open the other gate.
Are you…? Just click your answer!
And if you don't mind, can you type in your age? I mean, how old are you?
